item.title: Aliquam
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. item.title: Hillary vs. Trump
item.description: 2016 California Contributors for Hillary vs.Â Trump This was a project that we created during our course in Applied Statistics to understand the difference in contribution received (in $) b/w Hillary and Trump in the US 2016 Presidential Elections. knitr::opts_chunk$set( message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, tidy=FALSE, # display code as typed size="small") # slightly smaller font for code options(digits = 3) # default figure size knitr::opts_chunk$set( fig.width=12, fig.height=8, fig.

item.title: Top 25 consumers of wine in the world
item.description: Countries that love to get drunk on wine! This was a project that we created during our course in Applied Statistics to visualise the top 25 wine consuming countries in the world. knitr::opts_chunk$set( message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, tidy=FALSE, # display code as typed size="small") # slightly smaller font for code options(digits = 3) # default figure size knitr::opts_chunk$set( fig.width=12, fig.height=6.75, fig.align = "center" ) We start off by loading our data frame and then checking which values were missing.
